page.title: 10MEDIA
page.content: The Knighton area is served by the {Midlands Television Transmitter}and although we are in Wales we cannot receive B.B.C.Wales or B.B.C Cymru. All the national newspapers can be read each day but the only evening paper which can be bought is the Shropshire Star. The local weekly papers cover news from a wide area.The publications available are the {Mid Wales Journal, {Brecon and Radnor Times,and the {Hereford Times.} There is a local non profit making publication called the { {Knighton Times.}The local Tourist Association has published a {Knighton {Town Guide}which gives a great deal of information about Knighton and district. The {Town Crier}walks around town announcing local events.
